name: KOLIMA
description:
kolima is a terrible game

kolima will involve shooting various enemies in a speed-run orientated roguelite experience

kolima currently only shows off the conceptual part of the game, and everything is up for change

kolima is in a heavily prototype phase, and is really not a game at the minute

you're welcome to trial kolima and give feedback/say how awful it is

changelog:

changed placeholder assets

capped fps to 60 \0/
